website_summaries.verdict: This thick, high-quality paper with metallic embellishments is sturdy and won't show the contents through the paper.
pros: Bold design in vivid colors that work for all present giving
The grid on the back makes it easy to cut accurately
Sets are available in 5 color and pattern combinations
cons: A few rolls had some manufacturing creases

customer_reviews.title: The design wears off without doing much to the paper.
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper is very pretty and looks as it does on the picture, how ever when I started to wrap my gift the wrapping paper continued to tear and when I finally was able to wrap my gift (which is a simple book) I’m the type of person who creases the corners of the items I wrap and my thumb was blue with the color of the wrappping paper and when I looked at the wrapping, there was significant wear to the design and color of the wrapping paper. I don’t recommend this for that simple reason if the paint is gonna wear off that it’s just not worth it to buy
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Utykanski

customer_reviews.title: Could be good with better quality control
customer_reviews.text: Good—Seems like a good quality paper, appears to be a decent amount on the rolls. Bad— as I am unrolling the paper to wrap gifts for tomorrow THE MIDDLE of the roll is torn to shreds. This had to happen when it was made because it was still shrink wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice. Thickness is perfect, doesn't tear easy, and has the grid lines, so all around I'd definitely recommend. The only problem is the price in comparison to how small these rolls actually are. I can get atleast 3 decent size apparel boxes out of a roll, so it's not awful for the quality that you get.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Giant hole in the middle of the roll. Paper is good though.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the paper is good. Even has those grid lines on the back of it. Too bad there was a giant hole right in the middle of the roll or else I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Patterns♡
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is beautiful! It's a little pricey, but the quality is good, the paper is durable, and it's perfect for all gift wrapping occasions. The paper came in good condition and it's durable, unlike a lot of the cheap, flimsy wrapping paper from the drugstore. I love the patterns!
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Study & pretty - A COVID miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, high quality paper. The gridlines on the back make for easy precision cutting! The ultimate sign of success: recipients of the gifts made a point to not rip the paper because it's so pretty. EDIT: My homemaker mother-in-law (a person so picky that she returns every gift she's given because she finds flaws/scratches/stains that are imperceptible to everyone else) asked for a roll during the COVID lockdown when she couldn't purchase her own all-occasion wrapping paper. After using it, it's her wrapping paper of choice and I'm her wrapping paper dealer. It's a COVID miracle! This is the only product ever to receive no complaints from Agnes!
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality wrapping paper, not only is it thick but it has the grid on the back to make it easier to cut straight without tools.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful paper! Five lovely designs. At first I thought the price was a little high, but when I realized the quality and the volume I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: E.B. Henningsen

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller rolls than your average wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously 🤦‍♀️ these are way smaller than a normal roll of wrapping paper. Maybe 1/3 of the size. Just take that into consideration upon purchase. Photo is this set next to a already half-used regular sized roll; it’s way smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is how wrapping paper should be made. It's thick and sturdy, nice bold colors and the gold is really shiney. I've been disappointed in wrapping paper for many years. This wrapping paper is the 💣! It has the graph marks on back for straight cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are not a roll of wrapping paper they are pre-cut sheets all rolled up together.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought. I was very disappointed. I thought they were rolls of wrapping paper but instead they were pre-cut sheets of wrapping paper and either you had the perfect size gift or you wasted a lot of wrapping paper having to cut it down to size.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M S

customer_reviews.title: Not a standard “roll” of wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: Pictured is a blue standard size roll of wrapping paper (not from this seller) as well as two of the “5 sheets” of wrapping paper from here. It was my mistake to not pay close attention to the sizing. If you want to wrap gifts that are very small-this “roll” of wrapping paper will work once. If you plan to wrap for someone’s birthday or Christmas and have more than 2 t-shirts, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Hampton

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: the picture indicated that these wrapping papers are bigger then they are. They are skinny rolls, however, very pretty.. I will have to order another set to have enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it looks like there really won't be much paper but I quickly realized that they were just fine For the price I would have liked a bit more but the sturdiness of the the rolls will make it worth it. All the cloys are just as nice as they were in the pictures! Despite the delivery person throwing the package at my door the product arrived in good condition and wrapped as one would see in a store (: Really recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love loooove this!!! Actually sturdy good wrapping paper and went a longer way than I thought it would. I didn’t not want a Christmassy Christmas this year and did a black Christmas instead and I absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tassia

customer_reviews.title: wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than I expected which is nice, no tearing or issues while cutting or wrapping. Simple design so perfect for anything. looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Helkaahaien

customer_reviews.title: Leave me alone!
customer_reviews.text: Why can't I just submit one item? I don't have the time to answer all those questions about a product. If you get one star, I've taken into account fold, sturdiness, and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Wrapped a total of 52 presents with all 5 rolls. There were no tears when they arrived and did exactly what I needed them to do. Not to mention how aesthetically pleasing the finishing products were. Will have to re-order more paper for nexts year’s Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice selection of patterns and thick enough to work with. The black rubbed off around the corners as I wrapped, so be careful of that, but otherwise beautiful paper.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wrapping paper, great for all occasions except maybe children’s gifts. Very pretty highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper design selection is great. Fun and edgy designs. I used the black and gold hearts paper for my groom’s gift on our wedding day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and high quality wrapping paper. The gridlines inside the paper made meaning and cutting the paper a breeze. I used this paper to make baby blocks for my baby shower and was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality wrapping paper. Delivered quickly and undamaged. You get 5 rolls of really neat patterns and sturdy wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: flutesofchichi

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: I wished they didn’t have a glossy finish or had a choice for finishes. I wanted something that could be used for any occasion!
customer_reviews.author: ctp2236

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Thick.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful wrapping paper. The sheets are enouggt for a medium size clothing box. And rectangle in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Cathyrine Pili Bjorgo

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns and sleek look!
customer_reviews.text: What cute patterns! The paper was very easy to cut, good quality, and looked great. We had 60 small gifts to wrap for a team and they looked so good altogether with different patterns but the same color! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Returning. This it literally one roll of different patterned sheets. Sheets aren’t big enough to wrap a gift .
customer_reviews.author: Lanique

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for all kinds of occassions!
customer_reviews.text: So far have used for anniversary presents, wedding and plan to for Christmas. Pretty decent quality for the price, and just like the picture! Will probably have to buy more for Christmas season! :)
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee this paper - my boo enjoyed his gifts and didn't want to rip the wrapping off lol
customer_reviews.author: kenna34

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong wrapping paper. Could pull on it to make tight folds and it wouldn’t rip. Looks exactly as it does in the picture and worked perfectly for the occasion I was using it for!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Good wrapping paper. I’d say it’s a little pricey. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars. It looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: David Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: 4 of 5 useable
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 5 because only 4 out if 5 rolls was useable.. bit they are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: fester

customer_reviews.title: beautiful paper
customer_reviews.text: this paper looks beautiful together so it is perfect for christmas ..and there is just enough foil to make your pagages sparkle under the tree
customer_reviews.author: paulie

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love love love .. this is great wrapping paper it really pops. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nickollette Gerokostopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous paper!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant and heavy, this paper is a dream. Had a hard time making up my mind, so bought two different colors. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Loved using these papers for the 2019 Christmas gifts - totally fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.author: LJBevan

customer_reviews.title: Seamless
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut, even easier with grid lines on the back of the paper
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Okay but why is this the best wrapping paper I've ever purchased??! It's not cheap at all like there's no tearing this while wrapping your gifts. I'm in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Decorations
customer_reviews.text: I always try to decorate our restaurant with classic Christmas decoration and with this paper we achieved just that.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Best Wrapping Ever!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had such a hard time opening the packages because it is made with really good quality paper. He thought it was the cheap stuff that we’ve bought in the past for Christmas or the kids birthday. He kept raving about the quality and that he wanted to save it because he felt I paid alot of money for it😂😂.
customer_reviews.author: Chynap123

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Wonderful Paper
customer_reviews.text: Great paper to have on hand. It's lined on the back for even cutting.
customer_reviews.author: NancyB

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great patterns
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves everything art deco, and this pack of wrapping papers was perfect. The patterns are also flexible enough to fit most occasions, and I've found myself using them for everything from baby showers to general congratulations.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY My gifts look professional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white paper with gold designs. It came quickly and it's beautiful. Nice quality, not flimsy, quality printed designs. My package looked beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Hugatree737

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this wrapping paper!! It was perfect for a wedding. It arrived in great condition! Perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good design, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality thick paper. Wished there was more per roll in this bundle. Love the design
customer_reviews.author: CStyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick paper with grid on back
customer_reviews.text: This is very solid paper - especially for the price. It has a grid on the back to help in cutting straight lines, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Borchew

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, doesn't rub off when you fold it. Has measuring lines on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Narmeen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. High quality and each roll is generous. Add to that, each wrapping paper is protected by a plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is very high quality and worth the price. The patterns are really pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great paper!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this paper. Very easy to work with. Love that the papers coordinate, but are not the same. I actually used for a bridal shower with gold and white theme.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Item!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gift wrap. .....it handles well. So versatile as it can be used for so many occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and quality paper!
customer_reviews.text: Darling wrapping paper! we used it for graduation gifts and it turned out so cute and was fun to have them all look a little different.
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Rolls were shorter than Imagined. But that’s my fault for not reading it throughly. Paper cuts great and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Pate

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These colors were perfect for my sisters baby shower. The paper was nice & thick, held up really well with tape, ribbon, etc! Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Will Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paper because I thought it would be good for multi-use. It's nice paper with guidelines on the inside. It's not the thickest paper I've ever used, but it's strong and it's definitely a step up over other thin, tissuey papers.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: This paper was a very high quality and beautiful pattern. Will definitely get again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: I like the paper alot. The only thing that I didnt care for is the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Paper was durable & very pretty. Nicer than in pictures. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kristie kenniston

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money ! Very pretty in person
customer_reviews.text: Paper was sturdy but still flexible enough for easy packaging. Very pretty designs. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Really good looking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wrapping paper, as pictured and pretty durable. It’s not cheap and doesn’t rip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wes lo

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Art on Paper
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the variety of designs in black & gold. It is beauty with a rich color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Master*Peace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift Wrap!
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper is beautiful! The length of the paper is great! One roll wrapped a very large box. it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bennut Nu

customer_reviews.title: Love this gift wrap
customer_reviews.text: This paper was great. I was able to wrap 14 boxes none smaller than a shoe box for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Bretney mcafee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing ❤️
customer_reviews.text: The paper is visually stunning and wraps like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Holiday wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Since I am a horrible wrapper and make many mistakes, this paper is very forgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great quality paper! Good cat toy as well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, great quality paper. Very happy with this purchase. Cats also enjoyed playing with the scraps.
customer_reviews.author: Sig

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, strong wrapping
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry for gift wrap and this promised the fastest delivery and the patterns are appropriate for the gifts. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived and is absolutely great quality paper. The patterns are nice and the gold really stands out. I appreciate the guide marks on the back for precise cutting. The seller delivered on time with a super item.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, great condition, good quality paper. 5 rolls, one of each pattern. Clearly in the original packaging still. The backside of the paper has the guide lines which leads to easier cutting and cleaner wrapping. The lines are a little hard to see with my camera but there is guide lines both horizontal and vertically
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Steed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty paper!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty wrapping paper. I actually used it to decoupage the back of a cabinet and the inside of some drawers with mod podge and it looks great. I'll use the colors I didn't want to wrap gifts. The gold is really pretty and shiny without being too gaudy. The grid on the back is very convenient and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: See through but...
customer_reviews.text: Used this wrapping paper for wedding centerpieces to cover solid white boxes. If you’re trying to cover up a colorful present it’s VERY see through
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is sturdy. Thicker than hallm--k. Therefore very easy to fold and wrap. No tears. Can work for many occasions..male . There are 5 sheets and they are big enough to wrap 5 shirt boxes or sweater boxes. . I would buy again. Note..roll is shorter than others I have but for what I need I like itmore..easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Dontmesswithtx

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I hope they keep this in stock. I want to get the watermelon color when I have some room in my house. I love this wrapping paper. The white is not see-through like some other wrapping papers. They come in a nice array. My absolute favorite part is that the rolls have a lightly printed grid on the back of the paper so you can cut straight. Tbh it’s sad I’m getting so excited about wrapping paper. But here we are. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Wang

customer_reviews.title: barely anything- don’t buy- waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So small! Wtf how are these so expensive. Should have read the reviews and paid attention to the measurements but I just assumed for $14 I would get a decent amount of paper. What is this???? Wrapping paper for ants?!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The patterns and color are beautiful but for $10, I was expecting more wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pham

customer_reviews.title: Loved these for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Purchased this set to wrap multiple stacked boxes for a bridal shower. The paper held up well during wrapping and transporting and looked lovely among the other wrapped gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Bettlebee

customer_reviews.title: Very fancy wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is fancy and great for wrapping presents for family and friends who aren't children. I've used it 3 times now and I just love it. I like that it has the grid squares on the inside to help making wrapping easy and nice once done.
customer_reviews.author: Mandu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.text: High quality wrapping paper as far as I was concerned. It is not the big xmas rolls by any means but that is not what I was expecting to buy. It is great birthday wrapping and gives you a good variety to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Morwhsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice, vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: I love how vibrant the colors of these are. Be warned, the white and gold one is actually pink. I intended to use itg to wrap a wedding gift but ended up purchasing a paper that was true white instead.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality paper, timeless design
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality paper. Timeless design that is good for wedding birthday regular gift. So easy to just order on line
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful paper!! Nice and sturdy. Not too thin. Rolls are smaller than I though but the gold foil is beautiful. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ShamWoW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & quantity
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice wrapping paper. And you actually get a lot of paper...I didn't come close to running out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed wrapping gifts, pairing patterns by recipients. Pretty paper and nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Robbi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Paper!!
customer_reviews.text: The Colors are Nice, Vibrant...Beaautiful!! Plus, it's the perfect amount of thickness! Not so thin that it tears easily when trying to wrap something, but also not too thick. I will definately order from them again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This paper was great, it was thick and cut very smoothly. Looks just like the pictures online, too

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL paper
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper. Its thick and top quality. Very generous amount for the cost. Beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Paper
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a timely manner and was exactly what I was looking for. I needed it to line the envelopes of black and gold greeting cards.

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy wrapping paper with graph on back. Packages looked very nice, would not hesitate to buy again.

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: the most beautiful non seasonal paper ever. perfect for any occasion

product_meta.title: RUSPEPA Gift Wrapping Paper Roll-Black and Gold Foil Pattern for Wedding,Birthdays, Valentines, Christmas-5 Roll-30Inch X 10Feet Per Roll
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: Pretty thick wrapping paper,Smooth surface with a metallic foil shine, 3 park gold foil design and 2 park gold print design as picture show,variety to choose from.
SIZE: Each roll is 30inch(76cm) wide and 10ft long, 80gsm weight.Total 5 roll wrapping paper.
BUY NOW RISK FREE: If for any reason, you don't absolutely like it,just return it, and we'll refund every penny (or replace it, if there is a problem).
NO CREASE: Comes in roll form consisting of 5 separate individually wrapped in plastic, not folded so no creases!
ALL OCCASION: Design work well for any occasion -- birthday, shower, congrats, wedding, and holiday gifts.Also great for craft projects, table coverings, and other artistic inspirations.
